did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Proposal for a Working Women's Institute for Research and Education, 1977
did.origination:
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR);
Working Women's Institute
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "Proposal for a Working Women's Institute for Research and Education as part of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, Cornell University," submitted by Barbara Wertheimer and Anne Nelson of the Working Women's Program for Research and Education, December 20, 1976.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a "Proposal for a Working Women's Institute for Research and Education as part of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, Cornell University," submitted by Barbara Wertheimer and Anne Nelson of the Working Women's Program for Research and Education, December 20, 1976.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
